body_html: The simplest easiest way to deploy tensorflow is probably through docker or virtual machine. People do get it to work on older clusters, and if you search around issues you might find the solution to your problem. But it will not be easy. Good luck!

body: The simplest easiest way to deploy tensorflow is probably through docker or virtual machine. People do get it to work on older clusters, and if you search around issues you might find the solution to your problem. But it will not be easy. Good luck!
